verses.verse: If thou wilt <S%H7725>return<s%>, O <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, if thou wilt <S%H7725>return<s%> unto <S%H5493>me<s%>, and if thou wilt put away thine <S%H8251>abominations<s%> out of my <S%H6440>sight<s%>; then shalt thou not be <S%H5110>removed<s%>;

Thy <S%H1870>way<s%> and thy <S%H4611>doings<s%> have <S%H6213>procured<s%> these things unto <S%H7451>thee<s%>; this is thy wickedness; for it is <S%H4751>bitter<s%>, for it <S%H5060>reacheth<s%> unto thy <S%H3820>heart<s%>.

My <S%H4578>anguish<s%>, my <S%H4578>anguish<s%>! I am <S%H2342>pained<s%> at my <S%H7023>very<s%> <S%H3820>heart<s%>; my <S%H3820>heart<s%> is <S%H1993>disquieted<s%> in <S%H2790>me<s%>; I cannot hold my peace; because thou hast <S%H8085>heard<s%>, O my <S%H5315>soul<s%>, the <S%H6963>sound<s%> of the <S%H7782>trumpet<s%>, the <S%H8643>alarm<s%> of <S%H4421>war<s%>.
